issue.title: [CF 432] Spec Detection
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.180, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1

Installed Version

r432

Description

with 4.8.3 the addon is not detecting which spec I am in, so it is showing all the buttons/icons in the profile.

Installed Addons

_NPCScan - _NPCScan 4.3.0.2 _NPCScan.Overlay - _NPCScan.Overlay 4.3.0.1 Ace3 - Release-r1041 Ackis Recipe List - 2.3.0 Addon Control Panel - 3.3.17 Altoholic - Altoholic 4.3.002 Archy - Archaeology Assistant - 1.8.11 ArkInventory - 3.02.87 AtlasLoot Enhanced - v6.05.02 Auctioneer - Auctioneer Suite 5.13.5258 AutoRepair - AutoRepair 2.3 Bartender4 - 4.4.20.1 Castbars - 3.27 Chatter - v.1.3.3 Clique - v40300-1.5.1 Deadly Boss Mods - 4.10.8 Deadly Boss Mods - WotLK, BC and Vanilla mods - DBM-v4-r364 Old Content Mods eAlign - 4.2.1 EavesDrop - v2.46 Elkano's BuffBars - 2.3.1 - r167 EPGPLootmaster - 0.6.17 ForteXorcist - v1.975.9 GatherMate2 - 1.16 GatherMate2_Data - v8.3 Grid - 4.3.0.1453 GridClickSets - 1.05.05 GridManaBars - v1.04-toc4.2 kgPanels - 1.7 MikScrollingBattleText - v5.6.113 Minimap Button Frame - 3.1.7 MoveAnything - 12.2.3 NeedToKnow - NeedToKnow 4.0.02 Omen Threat Meter - v3.1.6 OmniCC - 4.3.2 oRA3 - r516 Overachiever - achievement tools and tweaks - v0.65 PallyPower - v4.0.19 PallyPowerWarn - r46 Postal - v3.4.13 Prat 3.0 - 3.4.25 Quartz - 3.0.8 RaidBuffStatus - v4.32 Recount - v4.3.0c release Retribution FCFS helper (clcret) - v.1.4.30.002 ScrollingCombatText - v6.56 SellJunk - 3.0.4 Shadowed Unit Frames - v3.4.4 SimpleTankFrames - r34 Skada Damage Meter - 1.3-10 SpamThrottle - SpamThrottle4.3.zip TellMeWhen - r432 Tidy Plates - 6.5.3 Titan Panel - 5.0.12.40300 TomTom - v40300-1.4.4 Trick or Treat - Trick or Treat 2.5.1.zip WoW-Pro Guides - WoW-Pro v2.2.0T (Trial) XLoot - r376-release
